channel.title: RuneFestScape new project! [659]
channel.description:
I'm making a new project [659] called RuneFestScape and I need a little help. I can code quite a bit so I need a client developer and website maker. When I get this server up and running it will be hosted vps and no I will not be releasing source for a while and it will be from scratch. :)
Application: Name: Age: Experience: Msn: How long can you be active: Why should I accept you:

item.title: RuneFestScape new project! [659]
item.dc:creator: @Ecstacy_Pkz Ecstacy Pkz
item.description:
@Ecstacy_Pkz wrote:

[quote=“KingKoder, post:7, topic:415928”][quote author=pk2play link=topic=517869.msg3762257#msg3762257 date=1316968023]

Change the name. Using that name with a 659 will get you sued easily.

If the name RuneFest isn’t taken I’m going to use it… no one has a copyright on the word Fest or Rune… Or else no one could use rune in there server… Which people do… So I’m keeping the name. Thank you very much.

I believe runescape has it copyrighted? Idk, but if they catch you they will take you down.
[/quote]
I’m brave. I don’t care if they copyright it and everyone uses it and I haven’t seen one damn person get sued… So I really don’t see the point in changing the name except I added scape to it… :s[/quote]
Have fun being BRAVE when you have a lawsuit on your hands.

Read full topic

If the name RuneFest isn’t taken I’m going to use it… no one has a copyright on the word Fest or Rune… Or else no one could use rune in there server… Which people do… So I’m keeping the name. Thank you very much.

I’m brave. I don’t care if they copyright it and everyone uses it and I haven’t seen one damn person get sued… So I really don’t see the point in changing the name except I added scape to it… :s
